channel.title: [TUT] How to add an object/delete an object in Project Insanity Source![TUT]
channel.description:
Okay here goes... This took me forever to find out (and i searched for a very long time!) so please, if I have done something wrong or different to how you did, please dont flame me, just let me know and i will edit/add it into tut :)
Go into your Server folder > src > Server > World
Then open up ObjectManager.java
Then press CTRL+F and search for this: [code]public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c)[/code]
Underneath it you should find some of the custom objects which whoever u got ur "Base Source" from has put in for example: Some Bank Booth's at Home
Underneath what is already there, put in this: [code] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(ItemID, PosX, PosY, 1, 10);[/code] Obviously change: ItemID for the Item ID of the thing u want to have there (Bank booth ID is 2213) PosX for the "X" Co-ordinate of where u want the item to be. PosY for the "Y" Co-ordinate of where u want the item to be. The next number 1 can be changed to a 2, depending on which way u want the item to be facing [u][b]LEAVE THE NUMBER 10 ALONE! DO NOT TOUCH![/b][/u] (unless u know what its for lol)
So an example would be, if i wanted a Bank Booth to face towards edgeville wildy in the middle of the "Prayer Guild" i would put this code: [code] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3048, 3488, 2, 10);[/code]
And thats it! Save, Compile and Run your server!
If you found this Tutorial Helpful in any way, please rep++ Many Thanks [b][u]Fluoxetine[/u][/b]
P.S. If this TUT is in the wrong section, please could a member of staff move it. Thanks again! :D

item.title: [TUT] How to add an object/delete an object in Project Insanity Source![TUT]
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

Okay here goes… This took me forever to find out (and i searched for a very long time!) so please, if I have done something wrong or different to how you did, please dont flame me, just let me know and i will edit/add it into tut

Go into your Server folder > src > Server > World

Then open up ObjectManager.java

Then press CTRL+F and search for this: public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c)

Underneath it you should find some of the custom objects which whoever u got ur “Base Source” from has put in for example: Some Bank Booth’s at Home

Underneath what is already there, put in this: c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(ItemID, PosX, PosY, 1, 10); Obviously change:
ItemID for the Item ID of the thing u want to have there (Bank booth ID is 2213)
PosX for the “X” Co-ordinate of where u want the item to be.
PosY for the “Y” Co-ordinate of where u want the item to be.
The next number 1 can be changed to a 2, depending on which way u want the item to be facing
LEAVE THE NUMBER 10 ALONE! DO NOT TOUCH! (unless u know what its for lol)

So an example would be, if i wanted a Bank Booth to face towards edgeville wildy in the middle of the “Prayer Guild” i would put this code:

		c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3048, 3488, 2, 10);

And thats it! Save, Compile and Run your server!

If you found this Tutorial Helpful in any way, please rep++
Many Thanks
Fluoxetine

P.S. If this TUT is in the wrong section, please could a member of staff move it. Thanks again!
